xtream.query

Class ADistributiveAggregation

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtream.query.AOperator
      • xtream.query.ADistributiveAggregation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    xtream.interfaces.IInPort, xtream.interfaces.IIOPort, xtream.interfaces.ILSStore, xtream.interfaces.IOperator, xtream.interfaces.IOutPort

    public class ADistributiveAggregation
extends xtream.query.AOperator
    This kind of aggregate only stores one value/tuple and each time after receiving a new tuple computes a new aggregation value and may update its only stored value It is good for MIN,MAX,SUM,COUNT and BINARY_SLOPE aggregations
    Author:
    ghalambor

        public boolean isUnary()
